chess.network
Class ChessChat

java.lang.Object
  chess.network.ChessChat
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ChessChat
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class handles the Chess chat session between the user and the opponent. TODO - be able to put a hyperlink

ChessChat

public ChessChat(java.net.Socket opponent,
                 javax.swing.JEditorPane chatPane,
                 javax.swing.JTextField textInput,
                 java.lang.String userName)
Create a new ChessChat session.

Parameters:
opponent - the socket connection with the opponent.
chatPane - the chat history pane.
textInput - the chat input text field.
userName - the handle to use for the user.

The method called by MsgRedirector...

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
This method is called when the user hits the enter button when focused on the chat input text field or clicks the "Send" button. It sends the message to the opponent and updates the local chat history pane.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
